title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Visual Notetaking Strategy Design for STEM Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can represent scientific concepts in spatial and relational structures through visual note-taking
Learners can apply creative approaches in STEM lesson design using visual tools that promote reflective/divergent thinking
Learners can systematize visual note-taking outputs into portfolios to support learner identity formation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
